text: Men's team squads for the Football at the 1994 Asian Games played in Hiroshima, Japan. ==Group A== ====== Head coach: Stanko Poklepović ====== Head coach: ====== Head coach: Ivan Čabrinović ====== Head coach: Bayram Durdyev ====== Head coach: Qi Wusheng ==Group B== ====== Head coach: Ivo Wortmann ====== Head coach: ====== Head coach: ====== Head coach: Koo Luam Khen ====== Head coach: Rustam Akramov ==Group C== ====== Head coach: Anatoliy Byshovets ====== Head coach: Valeriy Lobanovskyi ====== Head coach: George Smith ====== Head coach: Basnet Dhan Bahadur ==Group D== ====== Head coach: Paulo Roberto Falcão ====== Head coach: Dave Mackay ====== Head coach: ====== Head coach: Antoni Piechniczek ==References== ==External links== *https://web.archive.org/web/20150225222428/http://rdfc.com.ne.kr/int/skor- intres-1990.html *http://www.rsssf.com/tablesj/jap-intres1990.html *https://web.archive.org/web/20150531023209/http://rdfc.com.ne.kr/int/china- intres-1990.html 1994 Squads
